meanings.definition: A person who admires and supports a particular person, team, or hobby.
meanings.sent1: The football game was full of excited fanos cheering for their favorite team.
meanings.sent2: She became a dedicated fanos of the singer after attending his concert.
meanings.sent3: The group of fanos dressed up in matching outfits for the cosplay event.
meanings.sent4: Her little brother was her biggest fanos, always looking up to her.
meanings.sent5: The fanos proudly displayed their team colors at the championship game.

meanings.definition: To wave or flutter in the wind.
meanings.sent1: The colorful flags began to fanos in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Her hair started to fanos wildly as she rode on the rollercoaster.
meanings.sent3: The kite continued to fanos gracefully in the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent4: The curtains fanos gently as the windows were opened.
meanings.sent5: The leaves fanos in the autumn wind, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: A device with rotating blades that creates a current of air.
meanings.sent1: She turned on the fanos to cool down the room on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: The fanos in the gym helped circulate the air during the intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended the fanos was a magical wind machine.
meanings.sent4: The fanos hummed softly as it spun, providing relief from the heat.
meanings.sent5: The fanos on the ceiling gently whirred above them, creating a soothing sound.
